metadata.name: Elephant & Hydrogen Balloons
metadata.description:
Digital Painting created with Photoshop & edited with Davinci Resolve.

Once upon a time there lived an elephant in a village. The elephant was really strong and capable but one day he fell into a big whirlpool. While the elephant was trying to climb out of there, the elephant got some flying balloons, but are those balloons powerful enough to lift the weight of the elephant ..? What will be the climax..! Is it just my art madness or imagination ? I don't know!
